short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate summaries for YouTube videos, with a right click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
High-quality instant summaries from anywhere on YouTube:
Our Chrome extension works seamlessly across YouTube and generates concise summaries instantly, whether you're browsing the homepage, scrolling through recommendations, or mid-video.

Key Features:
- Instantly summarizes any YouTube video in a convenient sidebar without leaving YouTube
- Works on home page, video pages, recommendations, search results, etc.
- Many languages available

How it works:
- Right-click on any YouTube video thumbnail or title
- Select "RightClickYoutubeSummary" from the context menu
